thread.title: Elegant Hotel -
thread.title_full: Elegant Hotel - Review of La Reserve Paris - Hotel and Spa, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Ahmad-M-Alashram
title: Elegant Hotel -
text: A total pleasure to stay at La Réserve Paris Hotel & Spa, the hotel is elegant, lovely, friendly, and peaceful atmosphere made for a very happy visit. Their staff are very proactive, incredibly helpful and always smiling. The view from the comfortable room was beautiful. It's very well located, the location is ideal for visitors to Rue Saint Honoré and Avenue Gabriel. It is also near avenue des champs Elysées where is the garden at the end. I thoroughly recommend this hotel and look forward to staying there again.
